You should strongly resist any demand for this kind of payment. Say no and use the following to help you challenge the fee.

State that you would need an official receipt if you were to pay the fee

Mention that you will contact the embassy / consulate to discuss / report the issue
Explain that you must call your company first to report the issue and to get permission to pay the fee
